properties.name: Dept. of Geosciences UW Milwaukee
properties.description: Posted by MurfpmPete attended graduate school here from winter quarter 1974 to 1977. Doug Cherkauer was his advisor

properties.name: Eastern Illinois University
properties.description: Posted by MurfpmPete & Donna met here. Donna majored in Business Education and Pete in Geology.

properties.name: High-Level Nuclear Waste
properties.description: Posted by MurfpmDuring the mid-1980s Pete worked at Earth Technology on the high-level nuclear waste disposal program for domed salt in the interior salt dome basins of Mississippi (and to a lesser extent Louisiana). Pete frequently traveled to Richton Dome because it was a a large shallow dome that held promise as a repository and many people in the program seemed to want a guided tour.

properties.name: Humble Beginning
properties.description: Posted by Murfpm1523 Stratford Court, Joilet, ILThis was home for the Murphys. It started small and grew to accommodate a large family.

properties.name: IGS Lake Michigan Filed Office
properties.description: Posted by MurfpmPete worked for the Illinois Geological Survey during the summers of 1972 to 1975. The field office was located about here
